Talk_0064:
<snd:Happy>Welcome back! First, let's get you off the
water, OK?
Talk_0065: Can you come back here first?

Talk_0067:

vehicle, or do you want to make

Talk_0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Oh good! I see you've made a bit of space

Talk_0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's bye for now, but come on back

Talk_0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's hold off on the racing until you

Talk_0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh no, no, no. Don't ride that thing with
the steering stick like that! It's dangerous.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Safety is priority number one around
here. You know that. So I'm not budging
on this. Not even for you.
Talk_0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When that dream machine of yours is
ready, go ahead and set it afloat on
the water.
Let me know when you're ready and I'll
open the gate, OK?
Talk_0059:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All right! I like your enthusiasm!


Now then, the first thing you need to do
is build your own vehicle.

You can use the materials we have here
if you want. This is your dream machine,
so it's up to you!
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>I said you can NOT do that!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>That Zonai device is for the rally!
Nobody likes a spoilsport. Especially
not this fella!
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was looking forward to seeing you make
it to the finish line, but so it goes.<sp:5:1:0>

Though now that I think about it...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I bet you did that just to keep me in
suspense. Clever, VERY clever! I can't
wait to see you do it for real next time.
Talk_0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:CallFar>Welcome to the Lurelin Water Rally!<sp:0:4:0>As you know, this thrilling event takes
place on the open ocean!

We have a variety of courses to choose
from and encourage you to select the
one that floats your boat. HA!
Talk_0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Come back whenever you want to give
it a run or just practice. Remember, it
won't cost you a single rupee.
Morning, noon, and night, your pal Bolson
will be here any ol' time you need him.
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Kiana over at the restaurant put all her
heart into making it for the HERO of
the village! That's you, by the way.
♪If it's fantastic flavors you fancy...be
sure to make your way to Azure Bay!♪
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh no, that won't do! The steering stick
is all wrong. I won't be able to get any
data with it like that.
Besides, don't you think it's dangerous
to drive like that?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>We put safety first around here. I won't
budge on that, not even for you.
0020: I want to try this course.
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>When your vehicle is ready to roll...
♪be sure to attach that steering stick
before you go-go-go!♪
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:CallFar>Your time is up now!<sp:5:0:0> Sorry to say,
but that's it.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:CallFar>Stop right there, you mischief maker!
You're off course. You have got to come
back here right now!
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseS>I saw that! You can't go taking your hands
off the controls! It's dangerous. Yeah,
now I have to suspend the WHOLE thing.
Talk_0025:

that's out of the way, I'm gonna get
straight to the exciting part...
Talk_0026:

for such a late hour.<sp:5:0:0> Since you've clearly
got ENERGY TO BURN...
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, well. I see the rain hasn't washed

like you're ready to make a splash...
Talk_0028:

a spin? There's no charge.

Talk_0014:

beginner course right here...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0029:

Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Okey-doo, let's go over the rules.<sp:0:4:0>The time limit for the beginner course is
<clr:0000>2 minutes<clr:ffff> exactly.

To clear the course, touch <clr:0000>all of the lights<clr:ffff>,
and get back to the gate within that time.

<clr:0000>Taking your hands off<clr:ffff> the steering stick
once you've grabbed it or <clr:0000>straying too
far off course<clr:ffff>... Those are big no-nos.
Enough said.<sp:5:0:0> Here goes!

<clr:0000>Taking your hands off<clr:ffff> the steering stick
